title: OYGSieg 6 Pack Mens Polo Shirts Performance Short Sleeve Golf Shirt Moisture Wicking Athletic Casual Collared T-Shirt
description: Performance Fabric Blend: material blend of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, ensuring our men's polo shirts are lightweight, breathable, and incredibly soft.

Advanced Moisture-Wicking Technology: Stay cool and dry in any condition with our moisture-wicking fabric. This technology efficiently moves sweat away from your skin to the dry areas of the shirt, ensuring quick drying while maintaining a soft and breathable feel.
UPF 50+ Sun Protection: Men's Golf Shirts, made with light-weight fabric boasts UPF50+, protect you from uv rays all day long.

Stylish Design Elements: Elevate your appearance, adding a touch of sophistication to your ensemble. The lightweight tech fabric not only enhances style but ensures a quick dry, making it the perfect companion for seasons like Spring, Summer, and Autumn.

Versatile Occasions: Our Men's Quick-Dry Golf Polo is more than just a golf shirt. It's perfect for daily wear, work, sports, and the new Work-From-Home normal. Whether you're attending Zoom calls or enjoying outdoor activities like golfing, hiking, or fishing, this shirt is your go-to companion. Share the comfort with family and friends – it makes an ideal gift.
